text: Hamaari Beti Raaj Karegi is an Indian television drama series that aired on Sahara One channel. The series is premiered on 20 December 2010 . The series stars Saira Banu. == Plot == Binaifer Kohli and Sanjay Kohli, Producers, Edit II Productions, "Hamaari Beti Raaj Karegi portrays the dream of every father of getting his daughter married in the best of family, hoping that she will live a queen’s life and rule the household." == Cast == *Akanksha Juneja as Anjali Shukla *Ravi Bhatia as Nirbhay *Shashank Sharma as Vikram *Debashish Nah as Uma Shankar Shukla *Kavita Magare as JYOTI *Shekhar Sharma as Shashidhar Chaturvedi *Shagufta Ali as Taiji ==References== Bepanah ==External links== *Hamaari Beti Raaj Karegi Official Site on Sahara One *Contest of Hamaari Beti Raaj Karegi *Facebook Category:Sahara One original programming Category:Indian drama television series Category:2010 Indian television series debuts Category:2011 Indian television series endings
title: Hamaari Beti Raaj Karegi
